ComicInfo.Title: Da Diss Dat Made Chester a Gangsta; 10 Toy Ideas That Didn't Make It...; The Simpson; Movie-Product Tie-ins; Cracked's How-to Video Clearance; In the Park; Lion-Sized Problems Faced by a... Lion King; Angels in the Sapfield; Bad Professionals; Politically Correct Kids Games for the 90's; Baseball Stadia for the 90's; Dee-fenses; Famous Missed Phone Calls That Changed History; On the Beach; True Spies
ComicInfo.Summary:
O. J. Simpson as one of television's Simpsons.
Politically correct supervisors who looks suspiciously like Nazis enforce games to teach children to adopt homosexuality, punish white men and become vegetarians.
ComicInfo.Letterer: Mike Ricigliano,Michael Ricigliano,Randy Jones,Terry Colon,Don Orehek
